Name: The Mill
Review Text: Great little bar. Very welcoming with big personalities behind the bar. A touch stuffy in there, but the crisp, cold beer makes up for it. Lads, ask for toilet roll before you use the loo, none supplied for the gents unless you ask for some.

Name: The Mill
Review Text: Great rock bar where the friendly barmaid (Lotte) lets you contribute to the playlist. Top marks for that and putting up with the difficult locals.

Name: The Mill
Review Text: Came from Ireland for a few days and spent three evenings here, casual environment and very welcoming. Very friendly barmaid

Name: The Mill
Review Text: Super place nice service but not good toilet for number 2 no toilet seat for men

Name: The Mill
Review Text: Nice place to have chill out
